posts.title: NFSU Entrance Exam 2024: Application Deadline Extended!
posts.summary: Good news for aspiring students! The National Forensic Sciences University (NFSU) has extended the application deadline for its undergraduate and postgraduate entrance examinations.
posts.body: The National Forensic Sciences University (NFSU) has announced an extension for the application submission deadline for the NFSU Entrance Examination 2024. This decision comes after receiving numerous requests from prospective candidates. Students now have an additional week to complete their applications and submit necessary documents. Please visit the official NFSU admissions portal for the revised dates and detailed instructions.
posts.image_prompt: A close-up of a university building with a banner announcing 'NFSU Entrance Exam 2024 - Deadline Extended!'

posts.title: DAU Entrance Exam 2024: Important Dates Announced!
posts.summary: The Delhi Ayurved University (DAU) has released the official schedule for its upcoming entrance examination for the academic year 2024-25.
posts.body: Aspiring candidates for the various undergraduate and postgraduate programs at Delhi Ayurved University (DAU) should note the important dates released for the DAU Entrance Exam 2024. The application window, exam dates, and result declaration are now available on the DAU admissions website. Early preparation is highly recommended. Ensure you check the official portal regularly for any further updates or clarifications.
posts.image_prompt: A stylized image of a mortar and pestle with ancient Indian script, superimposed with the text 'DAU Entrance Exam 2024 - Dates Released.'

posts.title: CMAT 2024: Mock Test Series Available Now!
posts.summary: Boost your preparation for the Common Management Admission Test (CMAT) with the newly launched official mock test series.
posts.body: To help candidates familiarize themselves with the CMAT 2024 exam pattern and question types, the National Testing Agency (NTA) has released an official series of mock tests. These comprehensive mock tests are designed to simulate the actual examination experience, offering valuable insights into time management and question-solving strategies. Access the mock tests through the NTA CMAT portal and enhance your readiness for the upcoming exam.
posts.image_prompt: A laptop screen displaying a CMAT mock test interface with a progress bar indicating completion, next to a stack of business books.
